what are your class timings?: Our yoga classes run Monday to Friday from 7:00 AM to 8:00 PM, and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM. You can see the full schedule on our website.
how do i join a class?: You can join a class by signing up on our website or by visiting the studio in person. We recommend booking in advance to secure your spot.
what types of yoga do you offer?: We offer Hatha, Vinyasa, Yin, Ashtanga, and Restorative yoga classes suitable for all levels.
do i need to bring my own mat?: We provide yoga mats at the studio, but you are welcome to bring your own if you prefer.
are the classes suitable for beginners?: Yes! We have beginner-friendly classes and instructors who guide you through every step.
how much do classes cost?: We offer single class passes, monthly memberships, and packages. Please check our pricing page for the latest details.
do you offer online classes?: Yes, we provide live online classes via Zoom. You can book them through our website.
what should i wear to yoga?: Wear comfortable, breathable clothing that allows you to move freely. Avoid jeans or restrictive clothing.
do you offer private sessions?: Yes, private yoga sessions are available. You can schedule them directly with one of our instructors.
is there parking available?: Yes, we have free parking spaces for our students near the studio.
how can i contact the studio?: You can contact us by phone, email, or through our website contact form. Our staff will be happy to assist you.
what are the covid safety measures?: We follow strict hygiene protocols, including sanitized mats, social distancing, and mask guidelines in line with local regulations.
can i cancel or reschedule a class?: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule a class up to 12 hours before the start time. Please refer to our cancellation policy for details.
do you provide yoga for kids?: Yes, we offer special yoga classes for children aged 5-12, focusing on fun, flexibility, and mindfulness.
do you offer workshops or events?: Yes, we regularly host workshops, retreats, and special events. Check our website or newsletter for upcoming events.
